User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://smalltownvibes.co/sitemap.xml

# Crawl-delay for respectful crawling
Crawl-delay: 1

# Allow search engines to index everything
Disallow: 

# Block bad bots
User-agent: AhrefsBot
Disallow: /

User-agent: SemrushBot
Disallow: /

User-agent: DotBot
Disallow: /

User-agent: MJ12bot
Disallow: /
